name: Her Crimson Hair
description:
Her Crimson Hair

A story of memory loss, as experienced by an old, lonely man.
Use WASD to move.

Interact with objects with the F key. With each progressive day, your task remain the same, but your mind is degrading further and further into nothingness.

Gra zrobiona na listopadowy Gamejam Cyberiady 2021. :)
